title: "[FEATURE] "

---

## Summary

A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like.

## Motivation

Why is this feature useful? What problem does it solve?

## Proposed Solution

Describe how you'd like the feature to work. Include:

- API or CLI changes
- Config changes
- New modules or components

## Alternatives Considered

Any alternative solutions or workarounds you've thought about.

## Scope

- [ ] Simulation / backtesting only (no live trading)
- [ ] Documentation updates needed
- [ ] Tests would be included

## Additional Context

Any other context, mockups, or references.
